title: GRAND PRIZE
description: The winning team will receive a cash prize of $10,000, as well as the opportunity to present their solution at a tech conference.

title: RUNNER-UP PRIZE
description: The runner-up team will receive a cash prize of $5,000, as well as access to exclusive networking opportunities with industry experts.

title: BEST DESIGN PRIZE
description: The team with the best design will receive a cash prize of $2,500, as well as a design consultation with a leading UX/UI designer.

title: BEST USE OF DATA PRIZE
description: The team with the best use of data will receive a cash prize of $2,500, as well as access to data analytics tools and resources.

title: PEOPLEâ€™S CHOICE PRIZE
description: The team with the most votes from attendees will receive a cash prize of $1,000, as well as recognition on the event's website and social media channels.
